question: A working group of IRDAI has proposed to reintroduce ILIP. What is its expansion?
explanation:
A working group of the Insurance Regulatory and Development Authority of India (IRDAI) has proposed to reintroduce index-linked insurance products (ILIP).
The Group opined that this can be an alternative or complimentary option to the conventional products and unit-linked policies. It was in usage before 2013. Bond indices such as 10-year G-Sec benchmark, MIBOR, one-year Treasury bill, SBI fixed deposit rate, and others can be used.
